#compilingToy.

= Compiling MinD Toy =

==Dependencies==

For compiling Toy version, you will need the following packages installed before executing _configure_ command:
  * build-essential
  * libz-dev
  * libpcre3-dev

And the following package for installing clamd support:
  * 

==Download==

Get source code from Google Code repository:
{{{
svn checkout http://mindwebfilter.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ mindwebfilter-read-only
}}}

==Configuring==
For using MinD with Clam Antivirus protection just execute:
{{{
./configure CXXFLAGS="-O3" --enable-clamd=yes --prefix=/ --with-proxyuser=proxy --with-proxygroup=proxy
}}}
